description: Returns a PackageDescription object that contains information about the requested package.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository that contains the package.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The name of the repository that contains the requested package.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: A format that specifies the type of the requested package.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the requested package. The package component that specifies its namespace depends on its type. For example: The namespace of a Maven package version is its groupId. The namespace of an npm or Swift package version is its scope. The namespace of a generic package is its namespace. Python, NuGet, Ruby, and Cargo package versions do not contain a corresponding component, package versions of those formats do not have a namespace.

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: The name of the requested package.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: A format that specifies the type of the package.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the package. The package component that specifies its namespace depends on its type. For example:
The namespace of a Maven package version is its groupId.
The namespace of an npm or Swift package version is its scope.
The namespace of a generic package is its namespace.
Python, NuGet, Ruby, and Cargo package versions do not contain a corresponding component, package versions of those formats do not have a namespace.

nested_items.name: originConfiguration
nested_items.description: The package origin configuration for the package.

nested_items.name: restrictions
nested_items.description: A PackageOriginRestrictions object that contains information about the upstream and publish package origin configuration for the package.

nested_items.name: publish
nested_items.description: The package origin configuration that determines if new versions of the package can be published directly to the repository.

nested_items.name: upstream
nested_items.description: The package origin configuration that determines if new versions of the package can be added to the repository from an external connection or upstream source.
